IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: FOR THE CHARITABLE PURPOSE OF DEVELOPING AND OPERATING BVARC HOUSING BLACKSTONE VALLEY CHAPTER, A RESIDENTIAL FACILITY FOR DISABLED PERSONS, UNDER SECTION 811 OF THE NATIONAL HOUSING ACT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: FOR THE CHARITABLE PURPOSE OF DEVELOPING AND OPERATING BVARC HOUSING BLACKSTONE VALLEY CHAPTER, A RESIDENTIAL FACILITY FOR DISABLED PERSONS, UNDER SECTION 811 OF THE NATIONAL HOUSING ACT.
IRS990.Desc: FOR THE CHARITABLE PURPOSE OF DEVELOPING AND OPERATING BVARC HOUSING BLACKSTONE VALLEY CHAPTER, A RESIDENTIAL FACILITY FOR DISABLED PERSONS, UNDER CHAPTER 811 OF NATIONAL HOUSING ACT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CORPORATION QUALIFIES AS A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. AS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ENTITY, THE CORPORATION IS SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX ("UBIT"), IF APPLICABLE. IN ACCORDANCE WITH FASB ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION ("ASC") 740, INCOME TAXES, THE CORPORATION APPLIES THE "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" THRESHOLD TO THE RECOGNITION AND DERECOGNITION OF TAX POSITIONS FOR ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE CORPORATION'S TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT THERE WERE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFIED FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

THE OFFICERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ARC OF BLACKSTONE VALLEY, A RELATED ENTITY AS DESCRIBED IN SCHEDULE R, DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION OF THE CEO WHICH IS THEN SUBJECT TO REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ARC OF BLACKSTONE VALLEY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION UTILIZES A THIRD PARTY MANAGEMENT COMPANY TO PROVIDE VARIOUS SERVICES INCLUDING ACCOUNTING AND BUDGETING, RESIDENT RESOURCES, AND FACILITIES MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE ANY COMMITTEES WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD WERE PROVIDED WITH A COPY OF THE FORM 990. MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE/AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWED THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING AND RECOMMENDED TO THE BOARD TO ACCEPT THE FORM AS COMPLETED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IF ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS RAISED IT IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD TO DETERMINE IF IT IS A TRUE CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST AT THE ORGANIZATION'S LOCATION.
OVERSIGHT OF AUDIT THE ORGANIZATION HAS MADE NO CHANGES TO ITS OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION'S OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE OVERSEES THE AUDIT.
